TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DisablePrivateReflectionAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Indicates that any private members contained in an assembly's types are not available to reflection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ordinarily, reflection methods, such a <xref:System.Type.GetMethod%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.GetValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, can be used to get information about private members at runtime. When applies to an assembly, the DisablePrivateReflectionAttribute attribute makes information about private members in that assembly's types unavailable to runtime reflection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instances of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisablePrivateReflectionAttribute"> class.
